title: The Most Favorite Champion of All Time [Voting Elimination] - Group A
body:
Hello,

who is your favorite champion? And who is the most favorite champion of all 137 champions? Let´s find out! I´ve created a bracked of all champions currently in the game. It will be up to you guys to decide who is the BEST champion. 

The **voting will last for 2 days**, then **2 champions with the most votes will make it to next round** and I will create another voting thread for Group B and so on, until there is only 1 winner.

The full Bracked can be found on my [FaceBook](https://www.facebook.com/RazyeLx) / [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RazyeLxGaming) or down below on the next link:

[http://imgur.com/pcaBLTL](http://imgur.com/pcaBLTL)

So lets get to it. Here are the first 9 champions. Vote for your most favorite. Only 2 will make it to next round!:) You don´t have your favorite here? Then vote for the one you like the most:)

If you have any questions, just ask:)

PS: Only votes on this thread count. I won´t count any comments/votes on other pages, forums, etc.
PSS: I use this Board, bcs I can´t post to General discussion, its bugged.

RazyeLx

**RESULTS:**

[http://imgur.com/wHk62ST](http://imgur.com/wHk62ST)

If you would get bored, check out my [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMVxkqVcf2KPo8dYfRcchJA). Thanks to every support!:)

Group B [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/qAj5uFam-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-b).

A bracket system doesn't work in actually finding the most popular champion... 

What if the top two are in the same group? Only one goes to the next tier and the number two gets eliminated in the first round.

What if the top one is in a group with all the other incredibly popular champs? It might get drowned out in the votes of others and get eliminated even though it's statistically the most popular.

So this isn't gonna be accurate. But it looks interesting.

Edit: scenario in which the most popular champ doesn't win

Most popular champ is liked by 12 out of 100 people (the community.) number 2, 3, and 4 is liked by 11. In the voting period, 70 people visit the forums. Out of them, 10 support the most popular champion, and 11 supports number 3 champion. 

Boards are random lul

Thanks for the comment. I was wondering when someone will ask:D 

Yes, you are right. Thats why I made a research on google and searched for which champions are most played, most picked and so on. From such data, I created the bracket in the system that 137 champions were line-up from the most picked to the lowest. Then I took for example Top 1 champion and putted him into Group A, next I took the lowest picked champion and putted him into Group A. Next i took second most picked champion and putted him in Group B... and so on, and on. This way in the **FIRST round** (that is running now) the "more popular" champions have a slightly better chance on getting to next round. And then in the next round, there will be random distribution (but I will get with the details, when it will be hapenning, its still too soon). And you know...if the champion is really the best, he will win anyway:) BUT LETS See.......
Oh well I'm glad you put some thought into how to best make it work
Frickin Knife cat ulted in outta nowhere an just one shot my boy Tahms chances of getting to the next round. Bummer.
